org.sensorhub.api.processing

Interface IProcessingManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IModuleManager<IProcessModule<?>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessingManagerImpl

    public interface IProcessingManager
extends IModuleManager<IProcessModule<?>>

    Management interface for process implementations

    Since:
    Nov 5, 2010
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<?> asyncExec(String processID, int priority)
      Executes the specified process in a separate thread with specified priority (If too many processes are already running, process may actually be scheduled for later execution)
      List<String> getAllProcessCodePackages() 
      void installProcessCode(String processURI, DocFlavor.URL codePackage, boolean replace)
      Installs a process code package (jar file) from the specified URL for the process URI
      void syncExec(String processID)
      Executes the specified process synchronously (method will block until processing is complete)
      void uninstallProcessCode(String processURI)
      Uninstalls process code with specified URI

      • Methods inherited from interface org.sensorhub.api.module.IModuleManager

        getAvailableModules, getLoadedModules, getModuleById, isModuleLoaded

    • Method Detail

      • getAllProcessCodePackages

        List<String> getAllProcessCodePackages()
        Returns:
        the list of all process code configured on the system

      • installProcessCode

        void installProcessCode(String processURI,
                      DocFlavor.URL codePackage,
                      boolean replace)
        Installs a process code package (jar file) from the specified URL for the process URI
        Parameters:
        processURI - URI of process type that this code should be used for
        codePackage - URL of jar containing classes necessary to run the specified method
        replace - if true, old code associated to the same URI will be destroyed

      • uninstallProcessCode

        void uninstallProcessCode(String processURI)
        Uninstalls process code with specified URI
        Parameters:
        processURI -

      • syncExec

        void syncExec(String processID)
        Executes the specified process synchronously (method will block until processing is complete)
        Parameters:
        processID -

      • asyncExec

        Future<?> asyncExec(String processID,
                  int priority)
        Executes the specified process in a separate thread with specified priority (If too many processes are already running, process may actually be scheduled for later execution)
        Parameters:
        processID -
        priority -
        Returns:
        Future object allowing the caller can cancel and know when process is actually terminated
